original_text: I will not need to do that, because the Father himself loves you. He loves you because you love me, and you have believed that I came from God.
korean_text: 이는 너희가 나를 사랑하고 또 내가 하나님께로부터 온 줄 믿었으므로 아버지께서 친히 너희를 사랑하심이라

sentences.original_text: I will not need to do that
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그렇게 할 필요가 없을 것이다

sentences.original_text: because the Father himself loves you
He loves you because you love me
sentences.korean_translation: 그분께서 너희를 사랑하시는 것은 너희가 나를 사랑하기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: and you have believed that I came from God
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 내가 하나님께로부터 왔다는 것을 믿었다
